sub_title: English copy editor & Dutch to English translator | For Dutch companies who want to communicate fluently in English.
summary:
You want your English copy to sound as good as your Dutch. But you struggle to find your brand voice in English. Your company needs to connect with a global audience. But you find it hard to write in English (even though you speak it effortlessly).  

You need real English... Echt English. 

Whether you are looking for a translator to turn your Dutch text into English or a copy editor to refine and correct your text, I will transform your words into fluent, flowing English.

✔ Dutch to English Translation
Translation is more than swapping a Dutch word for its English equivalent. It’s about conveying the meaning behind the words. I deliver clean, accurate text that is faithful to the original and resonates with an English audience. 
Result: Natural translation that sounds like it was written in English in the first place.

✔ English Copy Editing
Perhaps you have already written your website/ annual report/ marketing materials/ press release, but it doesn’t have the same impact as the original Dutch. I can help smooth out awkward text, correct mistakes and give your words a fluent English voice. 
Result: Flawless, native-sounding texts, free of errors.

✔ Language Style Guide
Most companies have a brand style guide, but it doesn’t always include how you sound. I can develop a language style guide to give you a consistent tone of voice and style. 
Result: Language guidelines to improve the quality of your brand content. 

✔ Academic Editing
All PhD students in the Netherlands must submit their thesis and academic papers in English. This can be hard if you are a non-native speaker. I can edit your paper for grammar and spelling, clarity and structure.
Result: Your work reaches its potential and increases the chance of being published.

✔ Copywriting
You know what you want to say but your text still sounds stilted and unconvincing. I can listen to your brief, research and write engaging, compelling (SEO) copy for whitepapers, articles, blog posts, websites and anything else you need.

Friendly, fast and flawless. 

✍ Personal service – no project managers or client relation managers. Just me, and you. 
✍ A people’s person - flexible and easy to deal with. 
✍ A language expert – with meticulous attention to detail. 
✍ Someone you can trust - reliable with deadlines and can work to tight turnaround times.


For all your translation, editing and writing, email me claire@echt-english.nl or 06 42 45 1332.

www.echt-english.nl                                                                                         

#unmistakablyEnglish
